meaning: स्हे रेप्रेसेन्त्स् गोओद् अन्द् औस्पिचिओउस् त्रैत्स् (साधु)। ॐ साधुने नमह्! (She represents good and auspicious traits (sādhu). Om Sādhune namah!)
commentary: The name ‘sādhvi’ has already occurred earlier in the Sahasranama (nama 128) and the speciality of this Sahasranama is that it is free from the errors of repetition (purarukti dosha). Therefore, although here it is recited as ‘sādhvi’, it actually consists of two different names- sādhu and ee.
